error:
Invalid `prisma.project.create()` invocation:

{
  data: {
    perfexId: 101,
    code: "PX-101",
    name: "Villa Ubud Renovation",
    description: "Full renovation of Villa Ubud main building",
    clientName: "Bali Villas Corp",
    clientId: 5,
    location: "TBD",
    projectType: "General",
    status: "ACTIVE",
    startDate: new Date("2024-01-15T00:00:00.000Z"),
    endDate: new Date("2024-06-30T00:00:00.000Z"),
    totalValue: 1500000000,
    createdById: "system",
    ~~~~~~~~~~~
    createdBy: {
      connect: {
        email: "admin@narapati.com"
      }
    },
?   id?: String,
?   createdAt?: DateTime,
?   updatedAt?: DateTime,
?   billingType?: String | Null,
?   estimatedHours?: Float | Null,
?   tags?: String | Null,
?   calculateProgressByTasks?: Boolean,
?   sendProjectEmail?: Boolean,
?   inspections?: QCInspectionCreateNestedManyWithoutProjectInput,
?   signatures?: SignatureCreateNestedManyWithoutProjectInput,
?   analyses?: ProjectAnalysisCreateNestedManyWithoutProjectInput,
?   members?: UserCreateNestedManyWithoutMemberOfProjectsInput
  }
}

Unknown argument `createdById`. Did you mean `createdBy`? Available options are marked with ?.
